div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 168px; height: 1px; padding-top: 52px; margin-left: 13px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
font-size: 13px;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 52px; margin-left: 243px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
font-size: 13px;
div.font: Cambiare l'indirizzo del tile server nel file leaflet.osm.js alla riga 17

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 268px; height: 1px; padding-top: 52px; margin-left: 483px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.font: Nella cartella 'config' della repository copiare e rinominare i file example.storage.yml e docker.database.yml rispettivamente in storage.yml e database.yml

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 211px; height: 1px; padding-top: 192px; margin-left: 512px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Con docker, creare i volumi
'osm-website_web-tmp',
'osm-website_web-storage' e
'osm-website_db-data'

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 208px; height: 1px; padding-top: 192px; margin-left: 262px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
font-size: 15px;
div.font: Con docker-compose, costruire i servizi 'db' e 'web' con il sottocomando 'build'

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 208px; height: 1px; padding-top: 192px; margin-left: 3px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.font: Avviare la migrazione nel database con il comando 'docker-compose run --rm web bundle exec rails db:migrate'
